explayerenderer.gui.settings.spectator_a:
Automatically switch player model in spectator mode.
Overrides playerName option if enabled.
explayerenderer.gui.settings.player_name: The name of player to render. It will be your name in default.
explayerenderer.gui.settings.sneaking_y_: Y offset when player is sneaking.
explayerenderer.gui.settings.elytra_y_of: Y offset when player is flying using an elytra.
If rendered model turns red when player takes damage.
explayerenderer.gui.settings.swing_hands: If the rendered hands swing when trying to break blocks.
explayerenderer.gui.settings.light_degre: The degree of light source producing shadow effects.
